text: “I xa a kolon, i yi a famun: Keli na falan yisarin waxatin ma naxan a fala a Yerusalɛn mɔn xa yitɔn, a ti, han Manga sugandixin faana, ɲɛɛ solofere dɔxɔde solofere nun ɲɛɛ solofere dɔxɔde tonge sennin nun firin nan tima.9.25 A falan yisarin naxan ma, na feen sɛbɛxi Esirasi 7.11 kui. Nabiya falani ito Yesu faxa waxatin nan falama. Taan nun a yinna mɔn tima nɛn koni a waxatine xɔdɔxɔma ayi nɛn.
